Desc: · [<u>Wound</u>] max stacking limit <color=#4a70b9>+20</color>\n· When a battle starts, inflicts <color=#4a70b9>20</color> stacks of [<u>Wound</u>] on all enemies.

· Every <color=#4a70b9>5</color>s, grants <color=#4a70b9>1</color> stack of the bonus effects of all parts of the set.
